title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project in the software (e.g., org.apache.ant), the following error message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars of the binary project when viewing the scoped type hierarchy.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Load a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant).
3. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy of the binary project.
